children.value: to creating headings for consistent and clear content hierarchy. Write all heading in sentence case.

properties.code: An extra large heading A large heading A medium heading A small heading An extra small heading
properties.compiled:
"use strict";

React.createElement(
  "div",
  null,
  React.createElement(
    Heading,
    { size: "xlarge", level: 1 },
    "An extra large heading"
  ),
  React.createElement(
    Heading,
    { size: "large", level: 2 },
    "A large heading"
  ),
  React.createElement(
    Heading,
    { size: "medium", level: 3 },
    "A medium heading"
  ),
  React.createElement(
    Heading,
    { size: "small", level: 4 },
    "A small heading"
  ),
  React.createElement(
    Heading,
    { size: "xsmall", level: 4 },
    "An extra small heading"
  )
);
